name: Phong Nha Escape Bungalow
address: Thôn Cù Lạc 1, Thị Trấn Phong Nha Bố Trạch, Quảng Bình, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Phong Nha Escape Bungalow có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, sân hiên và nhà hàng ở Phong Nha. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Phòng khách ở khách sạn được trang bị ấm đun nước. Mỗi phòng đều được thiết kế có phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc.

Khách tại Phong Nha Escape Bungalow sẽ có thể tận hưởng các hoạt động ở trong Phong Nha và khu vực xung quanh, như đi xe đạp.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách chỗ nghỉ 35 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: View gần bờ sông, vị trí gần trung tâm di chuyển đi các điểm thuận tiện

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Tien is very friendly, helpful and accommodating!

review.rating: Super hospitable host and fab location!
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Host Tien could not have been more helpful. He organised everything for us. Transfers, bus tickets and tours.  He even drove us to town at 03:30 for an onward connection!
Food was delicious and the guesthouse was quiet and peaceful, overlooking the river.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Nice place with great view on the river.
Clean.
Super nice owner (Tien)who helps with everything. 
And he is definitely not so pushy like a lot of Vietnamese. 
We really liked this place.
Great pool.

Big recommendation
review.comment_negative: You need  the scuter, but you can rent on the place.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Pool was clean, staff were friendly and helpful with a range of things including booking buses, transfer to bus stop and laundry and borrowing bikes.
review.comment_negative: The location isn't walking distance from Phong Nha central (30+ minutes walk). But if you don't mind that or biking it is fine.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Lovely location and property, great staff

review.rating: Great place to stay in Phong Nha
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Phong Nha Escape Bungalow was perfect for what we were looking for. Clean, comfortable and a good location with a beautiful view next to the river. 
A special thank you to Tien who made our stay special.
10/10 would recommend you stay here.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Very beautiful view, staffs also very friendly. They know everything about Phong Nha and give us many suggestions to do. We also had a great dinner at Bungalow. Thanks ❤️

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Nice location, helpful staff. Beautiful view with the river next door.

review.rating: Everything you need and more! 100% would stay again!
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
An absolutely amazing place to stay. The bed is extremely comfortable, the room clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful.
Restaurant onsite, lovely pool and scenic view.
